/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements, adding a vibrant splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, illuminating the scene and highlighting the details of the buildings and street.
